moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 Nf6 3. cxd5 Nxd5 4. e4 Nf: This seems to win the knight. However, Qa4+!? doesn’t due to N8c6!! and d5 fails to Nxd5.
moves.8. Qxb5+: Now this wins a knight because the white queen is guarding d5!
moves.10. dxc6 Bxc6 11. Qxb4 Rb8 12. Qd2 e6 13: Threatening mate easily. This is usually spotted, however Arjun didn’t!
moves.18. Qxg7#: Mate! I won an easy tournament game. I played 3 more games. Being the highest rated player in the tournament, I was favoured to win and played 3 more games. Let’s see if I won...

gameName: OTB 8: OTB tournament game I - a simple win
